items.text: back of a length on the stumps, nudged down to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: Mustafizur goes around the wicket now
items.text: angled into him, and he tucks it off his pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: width outside off and slashed fiercely, but point makes a diving stop
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: strays down the pads, and the batsman was walking down the track a half-step, manages to turn it off his hips to fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 leg bye

items.text: length ball on the stumps, he plays it gently towards square leg and they run two because the fielder has to run in from the boundary to collect the ball
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: length on the stumps, he steps out and pats it to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: over the wickets for the right hander
items.text: length outside off, and he tries to cut it but under-edges back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: straighter and on the pads, worked away to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: fired into the stumps, and blocked back to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: fired into the stumps from wide of the crease, he punches it down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short on offstump, and whipped away between deep midwicket and long-on
items.postText:
Thanks Saurabh.

And handing it over to Varun as the chase heats up. Adeel Khan: "Afghanistan must look at the required run rate which is increasing after every over...they should try to hit a boundary in every over. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: bouncer headed straight for the helmet. Forces him to duck under it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: beaten. Length outside off, looks for the cover drive but he isn't close enough with his forward stride
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full outside off, to the pitch this time as he drives to the sweeper to bring up his third consecutive fifty
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: shot! He's not fazed by the bouncer. Up at his ribs and he slaps it in front of square. There's no one at deep midwicket and it's four
items.postText: Winn: "Perfect 1990's chase of 250 target. Score at 4 RPO for the first 35 overs while preserving wickets, then accelerate at the end. I miss those classic Bevan innings in these situations.. nostalgic. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, FOUR runs

items.text: length in the corridor, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: short and very wide outside off, makes good connection on the cut but point leaps to the right to save some runs
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: full ball on off stump, steps out to make it a full toss and drives to long-off's right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, gets back in the crease and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: gets it wide of deep square. Arm ball slants into his leg stump and he uses the extra pace on it to swivel and slap it uppishly in front of square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: floated up at a length outside off. Makes him reach for it and he can't flick it past midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: full and in at off stump, mistimed straight drive straight back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punches off the sticker to extra cover's right
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run
